title.rendered: Loews Hotels & Co Launches “Free Spirited” Programming

content.rendered:
The brand-wide program invites guests to enjoy handcrafted low and no-ABV beverage options with local flavor 

NEW YORK, April 10, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Today Loews Hotels & Co, the brand behind 25 hotels and resorts across the United States and Canada, proudly announces the debut of their Free Spirited by Loews Hotels program. As one of the pioneering hotel brands to embrace the growing trend of mindful consumption, Free Spirited by Loews Hotels will provide elevated and bespoke hotel bar programming for those who choose to imbibe less or not at all.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/loews-hotels–co-launches-free-spirited-programming-302113177.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
